   â–ˆâ–€ â–„â–ˆâ–ˆâ–€â–€â–€      â–€â–€â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–“  â–ˆâ–ˆâ–„  â–€â–€â–“â–ˆâ–„ â–ˆâ–ˆ â–ˆâ–ˆ â–„â–ˆâ–“â–€â–€  â–„â–ˆâ–ˆ  â–“â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–€â–€      â–€â–€â–€â–ˆâ–ˆâ–„ â–€â–ˆ
    â–€ â–ˆâ–ˆâ–„  â–„      â–„ â–„â–ˆâ–€    â–€â–ˆâ–€     â–€â–ˆâ–ˆâ–€ â–€â–ˆâ–ˆâ–€     â–€â–ˆâ–€    â–€â–ˆâ–„ â–„      â–„  â–„â–ˆâ–ˆ â–€
      â–€â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–€        â–€â–€         â–€                 â–€         â–€â–€        â–€â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–€
      
  
      Kingdom Wars 2: Battles brings a fresh perspective on  the  fantasy
      real-time Strategy genre, combining the best of Zombie survival and
      long  term  crafting  with  complex  fast-paced  city-building  and
      skirmish siege combat. All in a beautifully, yet  gory  game  world
      where players fight across  the epic  battlefields  in  multiplayer
      skirmish and coop with thousands of other players.

      For more info go to : http://store.steampowered.com/app/253190/

      - Extract 
      - Copy the .txt file to your gamedir
      - Play
      
	  
      Notes:
	  
      Some people reported, that the game is stuck after the title screen.
      It's important to block the game in your firewall. If that still
      doesn't work (e.g. Windows Firewall causes the game to hang when
      other firewalls like G-Data work fine), use this quick and easy fix.
 
  
  
  
  
      General Notes:

      - Block the game's exe in your firewall to prevent the game from 
        trying to go online ..
      - If you install games to your systemdrive, it may be necessary
        to run this game with admin privileges instead
